question:
“the members agree that an armed attack against one or more of them in Europe or North America would be considered an attack against all of them”
The above provision which makes the heart of the NATO is enshrined in which among the following treaties?
explanation: The Washington Naval Treaty, also known as the Five-Power Treaty, was a treaty signed in 1922. It is among the major nations that had won World War I, which agreed to prevent an arms race by limiting naval construction.
